txt_en: Time renews itself, so can we.
txt_cn: 时光自新，人亦可焕然。

txt_en: Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.
txt_cn: 小事入心，最是难忘。

txt_en: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
txt_cn: 生活之痛不可避，但可赋其意义。

txt_en: Walk forward, even if you crawl.
txt_cn: 哪怕匍匐，也要前行。

txt_en: Don't tell me the moon is shining, show me the glint of light on broken glass.
txt_cn: 莫说月明，示我碎玻璃上的光。

txt_en: Not all who wander are lost.
txt_cn: 并非所有流浪者都迷失方向。

txt_en: What's coming is better than what's gone.
txt_cn: 未来可期，胜过往昔。

txt_en: My love of the wild, no less than my love and kindness.
txt_cn: 我之爱野性，不下于我之爱善良。

txt_en: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
txt_cn: 泛爱众人，慎信于人，无负于人。

txt_en: Living beyond death, living after death.
txt_cn: 生命超越死亡，虽死犹生。

txt_en: Smart is the new sexy.
txt_cn: 聪明即是性感。

txt_en: You ain't ever gonna burn my heart out.
txt_cn: 你永远无法让我燃烧的心熄灭。

txt_en: No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.
txt_cn: 不管别人怎么说，言语和思想足以改变世界。

txt_en: Love is always love, even in madness.
txt_cn: 爱始终是爱，哪怕在疯狂之中。

txt_en: If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there.
txt_cn: 如果你不知去向，那么随便一条路都能带你到达。

txt_en: l am the master of my fate; l am the captain of my soul.
txt_cn: 我是我命运的主宰，我是我灵魂的统帅。

txt_en: I wonder if the snow loves the trees and fields, that it kisses them so gently?
txt_cn: 我想知道，雪是否爱着树木和田野，以至于它如此温柔地亲吻它们？

txt_en: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
txt_cn: 勇气是抵抗恐惧，掌控恐惧，而非没有恐惧。

txt_en: I feel like a wet seed wild in the hot blind earth.
txt_cn: 我感觉自己就像一颗湿漉漉的种子，在炽热而黑暗的泥土里盲目地生长。

txt_en: We dream in our waking moments, and walk in our sleep.
txt_cn: 我们在清醒时做梦，在睡梦中前行。

txt_en: Didn't wanna be a princess, I'm priceless.
txt_cn: 从未想成为所谓公主，只因我是无价宝物。

txt_en: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
txt_cn: 于是我们继续奋力向前，逆水行舟，被不断地向后推移，直至回到往昔岁月。
